content.html: As context, we always interviewed in pairs: a primary leading the interview, and a shadow observing mostly. There were candidates who would ignore the primary female interviewer, only wanting/willing to speak to the man in the room.
content.value:
As context, we always interviewed in pairs: a primary leading the interview, and a shadow observing mostly.

There were candidates who would ignore the primary female interviewer, only wanting/willing to speak to the man in the room.
